question:
Consider the following statements about the National Digital Library (NDL):
  1. It is a free e-library set up under the aegis of the ministry of human resources development.
  2. It has been developed at IIT Kharagpur.
  3. It is an initiative under the National Mission on Education through Information and Communication Technology (NMEICT)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. National Digital Library (NDL) is a free e-library set up under the aegis of Ministry of Human Resource and Development. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. It has been developed at IIT Kharagpur. <u>Third statement is correct</u>. National Digital Library (NDL) is an initiative under the National Mission on Education through Information and Communication Technology (NMEICT). The National Digital Library (NDL) stores different types of digital contents including books, articles, videos, audios, thesis and other educational materials relevant for users with varying educational levels and capabilities.
